Module kivakit.core.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.logging.logs

Class BaseLog

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.logging.logs.BaseLog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filtered<LogEntry>, Closeable, Flushable, Operation, Startable, Stoppable, Named, Log, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseTextLog
    public abstract class BaseLog
extends java.lang.Object
implements Startable, Stoppable, Log
    Base class for log implementations. Handles background queueing of log entries.
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
